summary.span: 表示一个 .ascx 文件（也称为用户控件），该文件是从托管 ASP.NET Web 应用程序的服务器请求。

span.span: Represents an .ascx file, also known as a user control, requested from a server that hosts an ASP.NET Web application.

summary.span: 文件必须从 Web 窗体页进行调用，否则将出现分析程序错误。

span.span: The file must be called from a Web Forms page or a parser error will occur.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类与扩展名为 .ascx 的文件相关联。The class is associated with files that have .ascx extensions. 这些文件在运行时编译为 对象，并缓存在服务器内存中。These files are compiled at run time as objects and cached in server memory. 您可以通过在 Web 窗体页中的另一个 .ascx 文件中声明一个 .ascx 文件来嵌套用户控件。You can nest user controls by declaring one .ascx file in another including the latter in a Web Forms page. 用户控件包含在 ASP.NET Web 窗体页中，并为 Web 开发人员提供了一种简单的方法来捕获常用的 Web UI。User controls are contained in ASP.NET Web Forms pages, and offer Web developers an easy way to capture commonly used Web UI. 它们以类似于对象的方式实例化和缓存 。They are instantiated and cached in ways similar to objects. 但与页不同，不能独立调用用户控件。Unlike pages, however, user controls cannot be called independently. 它们只能从页面或包含它们的其他用户控件中调用。They can only be called from the page or other user control that contains them. 如果要使用代码隐藏技术创建用户控件，请从此类派生。Derive from this class if you want to create a user control using the code-behind technique. 如果使用此方法开发 Web 窗体页，则建议使用此方法。This is recommended if you are developing Web Forms pages using this technique. 有关以声明方式创建用户控件的信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 用户控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5e601b3d-bb16-4dbe-9e35-7e92a34565ca)。For information about creating user controls declaratively, see [ASP.NET User Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5e601b3d-bb16-4dbe-9e35-7e92a34565ca). ## Examples 下面的示例中定义的类 `SimpleControl` 继承了类， 并可用作 ASP.NET 的代码隐藏类。The class defined in the following example, `SimpleControl`, inherits the class and can be used as an ASP.NET code-behind class. 它使用 、 和 Web 服务器控件并定义一个方法， `myButton_Click` 该方法将 属性值和两个字符串一起分配给 属性。It uses the , , and Web server controls and defines a `myButton_Click` method that assigns the property value, along with two strings, to the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl/CS/simplecontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl/VB/simplecontrol.vb#2)] 下面的示例为 .ascx 文件中包含的标记。The following example is markup contained in an .ascx file. 您可以使用 `SimpleControl` 在前面的示例中定义的类作为此 .ascx 文件中的标记的代码隐藏类。You can use the `SimpleControl` class defined in the previous example as a code-behind class for the markup in this .ascx file. [!code-aspx-csharp[Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl/CS/simpleformcs.ascx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl/VB/simpleformvb.ascx#3)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不会创建类的实例 。You do not typically create an instance of the class. 若要创建自己的用户控件，请从 类继承。To create your own user control, inherit from the class. 若要以编程方式在 ASP.NET 页上创建新的用户控件，请使用 方法。To create a new user control on an ASP.NET page programmatically, use the method.

related.span: 如何：以编程方式创建用户控件的实例

span.span: How to: Create Instances of User Controls Programmatically

summary.span: 为当前 Web 请求获取 对象。

span.span: Gets the object for the current Web request.

span.span: The object for the current Web request.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将两个键值对添加到与用户控件关联的应用程序状态（如果用户控件的 属性返回） `false` 。The following example adds two key value pairs to the application state associated with a user control if the user control's property returns `false`. 如果满足此条件，则代码 通过用户控件的属性使用方法 添加键及其值。When this condition is met, the code uses the method, through the user control's property, to add the keys and their values. span.span: Gets a collection of all attribute name and value pairs declared in the user control tag within the .aspx file.

value.span: 包含在用户控件标记中声明的所有名称和值对的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains all the name and value pairs declared in the user control tag.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用用户控件的 属性访问 `Message` 在自定义控件标记中声明的属性，该标记在包含它的页上实例化用户控件。The following code example uses the user control's property to access the `Message` attribute declared in the custom control tag that instantiated the user control on the page that contains it. [!code-csharp[UserControl_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl_Properties/CS/usercontrol_properties.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[UserControl_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl_Properties/VB/usercontrol_properties.vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取与包含用户控件的应用程序关联的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that is associated with the application that contains the user control.

value.span: 用来存储用户控件的数据的 对象。

span.span: The object in which to store the user control's data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许你存储数据以供以后检索，并在应用程序之间共享。The allows you to store data for later retrieval, and is shared across the application. 存储的数据与当前页或用户会话无关。The data that you store is independent of the current page or user session. 如果创建数据的速度较慢，通过此属性访问数据可提高页面或应用程序性能。Access data through this property to boost page or application performance if creating the data is slow. 有关使用缓存的详细信息，请参阅 [缓存应用程序数据](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6hbbsfk6(v=vs.100))。For more information about using the Cache, see [Caching Application Data](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6hbbsfk6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性将 Web 服务器控件的属性值存储 `txtValue` 在 与用户控件的应用程序关联的对象中。The following example uses the property to store the property value of a Web server control, `txtValue`, in the object associated with the user control's application. 它使用 属性来执行此操作，并将项的键参数值指定为 `txtName.Text` 。It uses the property to do so, assigning the item a key parameter value of `txtName.Text`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.this Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.this Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.this Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.this Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取对该用户控件的缓存参数集合的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of caching parameters for this user control.

value.span: 一个 ，包含为该 定义缓存参数的属性。

span.span: A containing properties that define the caching parameters for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义类的实例的缓存参数 。The property defines the cache parameters for the instance of the class. 属性是只读的; 但是，您可以设置它返回的对象的属性 。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 不能以声明方式设置属性。The property cannot be set declaratively. 它必须以编程方式进行设置。It must be set programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定是否可以缓存用户控件，如果是，则设置 属性以将控件缓存10秒。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether the user control can be cached, and if so, sets the property to cache the control for 10 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[UserControlCachePolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControlCachePolicy/CS/usercontrolcachepolicycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[UserControlCachePolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControlCachePolicy/VB/usercontrolcachepolicyvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 对用户控件执行 RAD 调试器所需的任何初始化步骤。

summary.span: 由于页和用户控件之间存在某些差异，此方法可确保正确初始化用户控件。

span.span: Since there are some differences between pages and user controls, this method makes sure that the user control is initialized properly.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例在 `Page_Init` 请求处理阶段调用方法。The following example calls the method during the `Page_Init` stage of request processing. 在这种情况下，它是从页本身初始化的，但您可以从另一个控件初始化它，然后 将包含页的属性值作为此方法的参数传递。In this case it is initialized from the page itself, but you could initialize it from another control and pass the property value of the containing page as the parameter for this method. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将两个键值对添加到与用户控件关联的应用程序状态（如果用户控件的 属性返回） `false` 。The following example adds two key value pairs to the application state associated with a user control if the user control's property returns `false`. 如果满足此条件，则代码 通过用户控件的属性使用方法 添加键及其值。When this condition is met, the code uses the method, through the user control's property, to add the keys and their values. param.name: savedState
param.span: 一个 ，它表示要还原的用户控件状态。

span.span: An that represents the user control state to be restored.

summary.span: 从用 方法保存的上一个用户控件请求还原视图状态信息。

span.span: Restores the view-state information from a previous user control request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 您可以将视图状态值加载到字段，以便以后不必从属性中检索它 。You can load a view-state value into a field so that you do not have to retrieve it from the property later. 你还可以在调用之前将值插入 属性中 ，这是使字段在往返行程之间保持不变的有效方法。You can also insert the value into the property just before calling , which is an effective way to make a field persist across round trips to the server. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个用户控件，该控件使用和方法管理其视图状态 。The following example demonstrates a user control that manages its view state using the and methods. [!code-csharp[UserControl_StateManagement#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl_StateManagement/CS/usercontrol2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UserControl_StateManagement#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl_StateManagement/VB/usercontrol2.vb#1)]

The physical path to the file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 方法类似，此方法会映射 .ascx 文件所在位置的路径，而不是 .aspx 文件的位置。While similar to the method, this method maps the path from the .ascx file's location, not the .aspx file's location. 可以使用此方法获取与对象关联的图像或其他资源的目录路径 。You can use this method to obtain a path to a directory of images or other resources associated with your object. ## Examples 下面的示例调用 方法，将 `actualServerPath` 变量与名为的用户控件关联的物理路径相关联 `myControl` 。The following example calls the method to associate an `actualServerPath` variable with the physical path associated with the user control named `myControl`. summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当通过此方法通知时， 必须执行创建和设置实例所需的任何初始化步骤。When notified by this method, the must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 此方法确认与实例关联的站点信息 ，并确保类正确地初始化为 对象。This method confirms site information associated with the instance and ensures that the class is initialized correctly as a object. 在用户控件生命周期的此阶段中，尚未填充控件的视图状态。In this stage of the user control's lifecycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 此外，如果调用此方法，则不能访问其他服务器控件，无论它是此控件的子控件还是父控件。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 不一定要创建其他服务器控件并准备好进行访问。Other server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性获取用户控件的物理路径。The following example uses the property to obtain the physical path of the user control. 当 属性设置为 `myControl` 时，用户控件的位置由包含使用语法的页或用户控件获取 `myControl.Request.Path` 。With an property set to `myControl`, the user control's location is obtained by a containing page or user control using the `myControl.Request.Path` syntax. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性来写入正在运行用户控件的 Web 服务器计算机的名称。The following example uses the property to write the name of the Web server computer on which the user control is running. `myControl.Response.Write`语法指示用户控件显示控件用语法获得的信息 `myControl.Server.Machinename` 。The `myControl.Response.Write` syntax instructs the user control to display the information the control obtains with the `myControl.Server.Machinename` syntax. summary.span: 保存自上次页回发以来发生的所有用户控件视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves any user control view-state changes that have occurred since the last page postback.

returns.span: 返回用户控件的当前视图状态。

span.span: Returns the user control's current view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与控件关联的视图状态，则返回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the control, it returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，不需要调用此方法。In general, you do not need to call this method. 但是，如果将自定义信息存储在视图状态中，则可以重写此方法以实现此目的。However, if you store custom information in view state, you can override this method to do so. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个用户控件，该控件使用和方法管理其视图状态 。The following example demonstrates a user control that manages its view state using the and methods. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将值添加到 用户控件的属性。The following example adds values to the property of a user control. `myControl.Session.Add`语法将两个 Web 服务器控件的值插入到与用户控件关联的会话以及包含它的页面。The `myControl.Session.Add` syntax inserts the values of two Web server controls to the session associated with the user control and the page that contains it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪跟踪并显示有关 Web 请求的执行详细信息。Tracing tracks and presents the execution details about a Web request. 要使跟踪数据在呈现的页中可见，你必须为该页启用跟踪。For trace data to be visible in a rendered page, you must enable tracing for that page. 默认情况下，页面跟踪处于禁用状态。By default, page tracing is disabled. 若要为页面启用跟踪，请使用 [@ page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) 指令，如下所示： \<%@ Page trace="true" %>To enable tracing for a page, use the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive as follows: \<%@ Page trace="true" %>
